1.1.name: wordpress/go-splash
1.1.description:
The Go Splash plugin will hide your WordPress site behind a splashscreen. It show a simple & clean splash screen with an integrated login form. Anyone that is not logged in is served the splash screen. Logged in users see your site as a normal WordPress site and will never even know a splashscreen exists. When visitors log in on the splash-screen they are re-routed to your main front page.

basic features

-. splash screen for non registered visitors
-. show blog title or turn it off
-. show blog description or turn it off

enhanced features

. add a personal message to the splash screen
. re-route users upon login
. register from the splash-screen
. reroute (completely hide) the wp-login & wp-admin screens to the splash screen.
